column5: This one is for LEW ...not a Canadian Ship but cool just the same One of our members an older Portuguese Gentleman had it sent to him this is of the coast of Portugal.  His home town is in the background I send this to you for the same reason he sent it to me. Looks like a good day on the water to me!
That is an awesome photo Peter, thanks for sharing!
I'm thinking the galley might have a few broken eggs. What a shot!
Looks almost as rough as Lake Erie when I use to fish the Southtown Walleye Derby......took a beating but kept on fishen....

Thanks for that Pete, what a fantastic picture of something that you and I both had the priveledge of going thru but also something that's hard to explain to someone who's never experienced it.  Wildest trip I ever made was running thru 75' waves while crossing the North Sea on our way in to Norway. That's the kinda stuff that stays with you for a lifetime.  Here's a great website you may enjoy too Pete with forums for most of the Navies of the world including some good stuff about Canadian ships.  http://www.worldnavalships.com/forums/index.php
